projectList.name: Spotify PPM
projectList.what: Finds common artist and songs between friends and makes a playlist for them.
projectList.why: xxKeefer and I made this web-app for a 2 day Coder Academy JavaScript Hackathon, which we placed first for.

projectList.name: DLM
projectList.what: A 'fake' web-app that can be used for learners and driving instructors to book driving lessons.
projectList.why: For a Coder Academy assignment where we were tasked to build a 2-way marketplace for clients using Ruby on Rails and PostgreSQL.
